e type of germ causing the infection and your age and overall health. (For more information, go to ""Who Is at Risk for Pneumonia?"")
                
See your doctor promptly if you:
                
Have a high fever
                
Have shaking chills
                
Have a cough with phlegm (a slimy substance), which doesn't improve or worsens
                
Develop shortness of breath with normal daily activities
                
Have chest pain when you breathe or cough
